mapper.insert: insert into test_code ( name, age, status, birthday, remarks ) values ( #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select id, name, age, status, birthday, remarks, create_time from test_code where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
